sentences.en: a country ravaged by civil war
Answering the prayers of the priest, Apollo sent a pestilence to ravage the Greek camps.
sentences.cn: 应祭司的请求, 阿波罗立刻送去一场瘟疫,让它在希腊营地肆虐.

sentences.en: Boars from the forest ravage it and the creatures of the field feed on it.
sentences.cn: 和合林中出来的野猪,把它糟踏;野地的走兽,拿它当食物.

sentences.en: His health was gradually ravaged by drink and drugs.
sentences.cn: 酗酒和吸毒渐渐毁了他的健康。

sentences.en: I will gain strange powers in this ravage.
sentences.cn: 于是我在这毁灭中获得诡异的力量.

sentences.en: Improved Ravage? Removed and replaced by the new talent Fury of the Wild.
sentences.cn: 强化毁灭 - 删除,被新天赋野性狂暴取代.

sentences.en: NIV Boars from the forest ravage it and the creatures of the field feed on it.
sentences.cn: 13[和合]林中出来的野猪,把它糟踏;野地的走兽,拿它当食物.

sentences.en: Ravage AOE decreased for level 1 and 2.
sentences.cn: 潮汐1级和2级的ULT的作用范围减少了.

sentences.en: The country has been ravaged by civil war.
sentences.cn: 这个国家被内战摧毁了。

sentences.en: The level bonuses of CattleBruiser, Ravage, and the Lich have been normalized against hero averages.
sentences.cn: 欺诈者, 掠夺者和巫妖等级提升的属性加成更接近于一般的平均水平.

sentences.en: The rape of the countryside had a profound ravage on them.
sentences.cn: 对乡村的掠夺给他们造成严重创伤.

sentences.en: This slow - moving mammal cannot move quickly enough to escape the deadly fires perennially ravage the land.
sentences.cn: 这种行动迟缓的哺乳动物跑得不够快,无法逃过那些不断破坏土地的致命火灾.

sentences.en: Tiger's Fury damage should now scale properly when used with Shred and Ravage.
sentences.cn: 狂暴和撕碎,创伤一起使用时将造成完全伤害.

sentences.en: Will super storms ravage our lands and bring famine on a global scale?
sentences.cn: 超级风暴会破坏我们的土地,并且会在全球范围内带来饥荒 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: A town, country, or economy that has been ravaged is one that has been damaged so much that it is almost completely destroyed

trans.tran_cn: 毁坏； 抢劫， 掠夺
trans.tran_en: A town, country, or economy that has been ravaged is one that has been damaged so much that it is almost completely destroyed
